category.name: Specials
category.special_instructions: Savor the Unexpected: Our Daily Specials Await!

menu_items.description: Classic Cheese Wheel Pasta is an indulgent Italian dish where freshly cooked pasta (such as spaghetti or linguine) is tossed inside a hollowed-out cheese wheel (typically made from Parmigiano Reggiano).
menu_items.name: Classic Cheese Wheel Pasta

menu_items.description: Succulent grilled prawns served atop a bed of creamy cheese wheel pasta, creating a delightful fusion of flavors and textures.
menu_items.name: Grilled Prawns Cheese Wheel Pasta

menu_items.description: The Chicken is seasoned with fajita spices and served over a bed of alfredo sauce-infused pasta, creating a delightful fusion of flavors and textures.
menu_items.name: Chicken Cheese Wheel Pasta

menu_items.description: Succulent Mushrooms served atop a bed of creamy cheese wheel pasta, creating a delightful fusion of flavors and textures.
menu_items.name: Mushroom Cheese Wheel Pasta
